strings.string: Warning: Login credentials will not be saved in encrypted form!
Use audio version (may not be available for all contents)
You need to configure your login credentials[CR]before you can use this add-on.
Could not log into your Massengeschmack account,[CR]please check your login credentials!
Your login credentials for these contents are invalid,[CR]maybe you didn't subscribe to them?

Fernsehkritik-TV is a satirical and critical magazine, moderated by Holger Kreymeier which first aired in 2007.[CR]The magazine deals with current TV shows and throws a skeptical glance at them. Popular topics are bad journalism, (scripted) reality shows, call-in TV and many more.[CR][CR]Secondary shows are “Postecke” and “Sendeschluss”.

Pantoffel-TV is a magazine about all cultural things you can enjoy at home or (almost) anywhere else. It is the big successor of the discontinued movie critique YouTube series “Pantoffelkino-TV”. The main topics of Pantoffel-TV are new releases of books, movies, music albums, games etc.

Pressesch(l)au is a magazine moderated by Lars Golenia that concerns itself with all kinds of serious, not so serious, simply bizarre or rather rubbishy press releases. Be it “Brigitte”, “Bravo“, “Die Welt”, “Der Spiegel” or a teddy bear magazine – Lars reads them all and reviews them on stage.

Massengeschmack-TV is the satirical answer to all the scripted reality shows on the major TV networks. Obviously inspired by “The Office” and “Stromberg”, the series depicts the daily routine at the Alsterfilm studio.[CR][CR]Additionally to the comedy series, certain videos and uncategorized extras about the Massengeschmack network are published under the label “Massengeschmack-TV“, too.
All Fernsehkritik-TV episodes and extras, including Postecke, uncut interview and other specials.
Postecke is a video podcast where Holger reads and answers letters from Fernsehkritik-TV viewers.
All Massengeschmack-TV episodes, including “Das Studio” and any extras.
“Das Studio” is the Massengeschmack-TV reality TV show. It is guaranteed to be fake and scripted!
Invalid internal command![CR]This is probably a bug. You should report it if it happens more often.
